page.title: 03Welton School Log 1914-1918.
page.content: 11.9.14.Some of the scholars fathers and brothers have left for the front.Scholars very much interested in the progress of the war,incidentally adding to their geographical knowledge. 16.10.14.Scholars seem anxious to start collection for Belgian refugees. 3.8.15.Mr Stevens(a teacher)has joined the Royal Flying Corps. 30.6.16.Lowest number on books for some years owing to the war. 19.1.17.Formed War Savings Association. 50 scholars deposited Â£4.14.6. 22.6.17.Upper Standards are gradually being denuded of boys by requirements of special war work. 25.1.18.Parents generally taking advantage-withdrawing children because of war.
